headline: Alien Discovery Exposed as Fake News
context: The gripping story of an alien from $0 was revealed to be a hoax perpetrated by $1. Government officials interviewed about the hoax were clearly upset.
"We were all blinded by our own hopes," said Lt. Col. James McMasters, head of the U.S. Extraterrestrial Relations Office. "I am particularly devastated, as I planned to $2."
The beloved alien charmed Americans with his crazy antics, especially his $3. That he was revealed to be a $4 dampened hopes of extraterrestrial intelligence.
